The Election Commission employs annual revisions to update rolls.

title: Tourism in J&K on revival path, says govt; data shows slump in 2025 after Pahalgam attack
description: Jammu and Kashmir's tourism sector is showing signs of recovery following a significant downturn after the April 2025 Pahalgam terror attack. Government initiatives, including promotional efforts, have boosted tourist footfalls during the winter season. Despite a dip in 2025 compared to 2024, efforts are underway to further revive the industry, which contributes substantially to the state's economy.

title: J&K juvenile home breakout: Five detained, hunt on for third escapee
description: Authorities are intensifying their search for local gangster Karanjit Singh, also known as Gugga, who escaped a Jammu juvenile home with two Pakistani inmates. The Pakistani nationals were apprehended in Ambala and handed over to Jammu and Kashmir Police. Gugga, believed to be the escape's architect, remains at large, with his mother also missing.

title: This day, that year: When India launched the world’s first official airmail service
description: In 1911, Prayagraj witnessed the world's first official airmail service, a 13-minute flight by French aviator Henri Pequet carrying 6,500 letters. This pioneering event, staged at the UP Exhibition, marked a significant leap from pigeon post, demonstrating the potential of powered flight to conquer distance and reshape global communication.  The historic flight launched a new era in postal history.

description: Alabama wide receiver Ryan Williams, 19, announced his engagement to 25-year-old Alexis Hill on Valentine’s Day. Hill, who has one child from a previous relationship, shared photos of her ring on Instagram. NFL insider Dov Kleiman reported the news on X, leading to mixed reactions online. Some fans celebrated, while others debated the couple’s six-year age gap.

title: Larry Wheels slaps Deen the Great on Rampage livestream
description: The “FAFO” trend actions, bringing quick consequences, played out live on camera this week. What began as a relaxed and friendly stream quickly turned tense after Deen the Great approached powerlifter and influencer Larry Wheels and his wife, Sheyla Wheels.

title: Ramadan Mubarak 2026: Messages to share with your friends & families
description: Ramadan 2026 begins around February 18-19 in India, marking a period of fasting, prayer, and reflection for Muslims. This sacred month, one of Islam's pillars, emphasizes spiritual growth and community. It culminates in Eid ul-Fitr on March 19-20, a joyous festival celebrating the end of the fast.
